hanzi-su-wiki:
個

Значения

Индивид; отдельный; счётное слово

Мнемоника

  • Человек 亻 из родовитой семьи, с твёрдыми 固 моральными принципами. Не такой, как все, индивидуум.

  • "У каждого индивида есть твёрдая 固 вера."

Варианты

个

gè
numerary adjunct, piece; single
цифровое дополнение, шт .; Один
rtega_mnemonic:
個個RS
X		independent person
  • 亻, hardened 固 in his ways.
厶 夋 尸 自 我 私 吾 己

個個RS
个个		numerary adjunct, piece, single, individual
  • single person 亻 with individual stories 固
  • ⓢ person 丨 having his own roof 𠆢
 厶 夋 尸 自 我 私 吾 己
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 固 indicates the sound; 亻 (person) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people
    • 固 [ gù ] to solidify; strength
heisig_chinese_memo: Here we have Mr. T who is so hardened (all the body workout he's had) that he became individual, that is, indivisible. "I pity da foo who can be divided into smaller units.".
heisig_constituent: individual, person, harden, pent in, old, tombstone, gravestone, church, ten, needle, mouth
Keyword_KKLC:
INDIVIDUAL, single unit
GENERAL COUNTER (for things or articles)
Keyword_KKLC_ru:
индивидуальный, один блок
Вообще счетчик (для вещей или изделий)
koohiiStory1: This keyword gave me trouble, I could write the kanji from memory but could not remember the keyword the other way around. In such case the dictionary definition can be helpful : "Middle English, single, indivisible". Here we have Mr. T. who is so hardened (all the body workout he´s had) that he became in-dividual, that is, in-divisible. "I pity da foo who can be divided into smaller units.".
koohiiStory2: Mr. T insists that people be individual. He appears on television, saying, "Being an individual is hard! But you gotta do it! Harden yourself, and be individual!".
jp_example_words:
個(か): article counter
個々(ここ): individual, one by one
個性(こせい): individuality, personality, idiosyncrasy
個別(こべつ): particular case
個所(かしょ): passage, place, point, part
個人(こじん): individual, personal, private
個体(こたい): an individual
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The leader with the old mouth is the one who has said many things. That makes them different from everyone, an individual.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine that leader's old mouth saying things that make the old man stand apart from the others. They are individual from everyone else.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As an individual, one must teach all the 子s (こ) their way. Their individual way.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: "You must be your own individual. Don't be a sheeple," he says to the 子s.
Ru_Notes:
Фонетик: 固 (かためる、コ твёрдый), 古 (ふるい、コ старый).
Аналог: 箇 (カ、コ штука).
Ru_Radicals: 化 (превращаться), 十 (десять), 口 (рот), 囗 (коробка)
Ru_trainchinese:
gè: (сч.слово) универсальное счетное слово
gè: (графема) отдельный, индивидуальный
gè: (сущ) размер, высота, рост (одинак. с 个儿)
gě: (местоим) сам
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the hard (固) man (亻) is an individual
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: An individual strolling along with his umbrella and walking stick.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " person ", " solid " sound, often used as a measure word, the same as "箇". "Zihui‧Renbu": "A, and Xie are the same." "Zhengzitong‧Renbu": "A and Ge, Xie are the same." "Yi Li‧ Shiyu Li": "I will explain three." Zheng Xuan Note: "One, it's still a small one, it's a common name or a name, and the sound is similar." Jia Gongyan Shu: "The emperor is solid, although the characters are different, the sounds are similar, and the same is the same."

" Ge " can also mean alone in modern Chinese, such as "individual" and "individual", both use this meaning.
humanum_short_description_en: From " person ", " solid " sound, often used as a measure word.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，「固」聲，常用作量詞，同於「箇」。《字彙‧人部》：「個，與箇同。」《正字通‧人部》：「個與个、箇並同。」《儀禮‧士虞禮》：「俎釋三个。」鄭玄注：「个，猶枚也，今俗或名曰個，音相近。」 賈公彥疏：「人帝著固，字雖不同，音聲相近，同是一個之義。」

　　「個」在現代漢語中還可表示單獨，如「個別」、「個人」，皆用此義。

Shuowen 说文解字:

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 個 from person-left 亻 rén and phonetic solidify-gu 固 gù C192 個<箇> A073 个[個] simp 个.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :

Simplification rule : A073 个[個]

Simplification rule explained :
borrowed-for-sound 个個 个 (bamboo) 個 (counter for people)

Variant rule : C192 個<箇>

Variant rule clarification :
個 (counter for people) TW 箇 <counter for people>

Applied rules :

New font rule :

從「 人 」，「 固 」聲，常用作量詞，同於「 箇 」。《字彙‧人部》：「個，與箇同。」《正字通‧人部》：「個與个、箇並同。」《儀禮‧士虞禮》：「俎釋三个。」鄭玄注：「个，猶枚也，今俗或名曰個，音相近。」 賈公彥疏：「人帝著固，字雖不同，音聲相近，同是一個之義。」 「 個 」在現代漢語中還可表示單獨，如「個別」、「個人」，皆用此義。
From " person", " solid" sound, often used as a measure word, the same as " 箇". "Zihui‧Renbu": "A, and Xie are the same." "Zhengzitong‧Renbu": "A and Ge, Xie are the same." "Yi Li‧ Shiyu Li": "I will explain three." Zheng Xuan Note: "One, it's still a small one, it's a common name or a name, and the sound is similar." Jia Gongyan Shu: "The emperor is solid, although the characters are different, the sounds are similar, and the same is the same." " Ge" can also mean alone in modern Chinese, such as "individual" and "individual", both use this meaning.

вм. 个

個

Значения

Индивид; отдельный; счётное слово

Мнемоника

  • Человек 亻 из родовитой семьи, с твёрдыми 固 моральными принципами. Не такой, как все, индивидуум.

  • "У каждого индивида есть твёрдая 固 вера."

Варианты

个

Radicals: ｲ, 口, 古  (leader, mouth, old)
Meaning Mnemonic
The leader with the old mouth is the one who has said many things. That makes them different from everyone, an individual.
Imagine that leader's old mouth saying things that make the old man stand apart from the others. They are individual from everyone else.
Reading Mnemonic
As an individual, one must teach all the 子s (こ) their way. Their individual way.
"You must be your own individual. Don't be a sheeple," he says to the 子s.
